contentrichtext.text: '''Xining Xiaoqiao Railway Station''' is a [[railway station]] on the [[Qingzang railway]]. It serves the city of [[Xining]] and is located 3 km from [[Xining Railway Station]]. ==See also== *[[List of stations on Qingzang railway]] {{s-rail-start}} {{s-rail|title=CR}} {{s-line|system=CR|line=Qinghai–Tibet|previous=Xining|next=Xining West}} {{end}} {{coord missing|Qinghai}} [[Category:Xining]] [[Category:Railway stations in Qinghai]] [[Category:Stations on the Qinghai–Tibet Railway]] {{Qinghai-railstation-stub}}
